#### Description
The Department of National Defence at CFB Gagetown, New Brunswick, invites suppliers to submit bids for the establishment of a Regional Standing Offer (RISO) for provision of all labour, tools, and equipment required for the cleaning of twelve sludge beds and geo-tubes at Building N-5. The contract is to be awarded on an as-and-when-requested basis.

#### Workscope
The RISO will cover the cleaning of twelve sludge beds and geo-tubes under the specifications of DND Job No. L-G2-5821/70. The contract is to be performed on an as-and-when-requested basis from May 1, 2023, or issuance of the standing offer to March 31, 2025.

#### Requirements
* Suppliers must provide all labour, tools, and equipment required for the cleaning of twelve sludge beds and geo-tubes.
* Suppliers must comply with the specifications for DND Job No. L-G2-5821/70.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

#### Assumptions
* Suppliers must assume all responsibility for compliance with Canadian laws, regulations, and standards.
* Suppliers must comply with the terms and conditions of the contract.

#### Tender Evaluation Criteria
The solicitation is a competitive Request for Standing Offer (RISO). The Standing Offer will be awarded based on the lowest price.
